root.name: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure
root.description: OverviewRygar was a game based in Greek mythology that also borrowed elements from the NES game of the same name. You play as Rygar and your main weapon is a sharp disk on a chain that is whipped out. You get 3 different disk, the one you start out with, a blue disk that you can hit fast but no range and a sand color disk that slow with a wide range. The game is very God of War-like and the disk can be upgraded along with abilities.StoryDuring a ceremony for Rygar, Titans come and kidnap the Princess because the humans have had it too good for too long.
